episodes.title: Cult Expert Jon Atack's Personal Story of Leaving Scientology & Signs of Authoritarian Groups #cult
episodes.description:
Today I welcome cult expert and former member of Scientology,  Jon Atack, to discuss his own story and provide invaluable information on spotting human predators and authoritarian groups. Jon has years of extensive knowledge and expertise on high control, cultic groups and is passionate about prevention and awareness. We discuss an array of topics from how he was able to recognize the lies and leave Scientology, his own research and findings on how human predators behaviors manifest themselves in every day life, and safe guards you can put in place for your own protection. This is truly an amazing interview I cannot wait to share with you!

🌻Mental Health Merch: https://dine-in-psychology.creator-spring.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/dineinpsychology 
Book: https://www.amazon.com/Live-Learn-Love-Real-talk-woman-ebook/dp/B07NJBLLSB 

CHAPTERS:
00:00 Introduction
01:55 Jon Atack's Experience with Scientology and Cultic Groups
05:05 How do predators get into positions of power?
07:20 Cult of One (DV Relationships) are Similar to Large Coercive Groups: What are the manipulative tactics used?
11:15 Lovebombing as a Necessary Cult Recruitment Tactic, High Control Group Tactics, and Recent Story of a College Cult
15:19 How did you get out of Scientology?
20:00 Recognizing the MAJOR Incongruencies in Scientology after 9 Years of Being in
22:48 Is it the love bombing or occasional good pieces that keep people in a high control group? Honeymoon Period and a Cult as a Romantic Relaitonship
28:05 Ask Questions: Any Power can Be Abused
29:55 MAJOR Reason why a person becomes involved in a high control cultic group
31:41 Secrecy Must be Maintained at All Costs
35:08 What can happen when members leave and how the threat of this keeps a person in
38:16 QUESTION THE SOURCE!!!
41:02 Final Words of Wisdom and Where you can Find Jon Atack's Books!

#psychologicalcommentary #scientology #spiritualabuse #psychological #bitemodel #manipulation #cultsandextremebeliefs #cults #therapist #analysis #indoctrination #personality #fundamentalistanalysis #religioustraumasyndrome #religiousabuse

FIRST DISCLAIMER: This video is NOT meant to demonize all spiritual beliefs and practices as research continually shows that having faith, or believing in a Higher Power can be a big source of comfort. Spiritual groups become problematic,  when members are held to impossible standards, rigid rules are enacted, and individuals are discouraged from having their own thoughts and or opinions.
